description: Detects various command line and scripting engines/processes such as "PowerShell", "Wscript", "Cmd", etc. spawning a "regsvr32" instance.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Legitimate ".bat", ".hta", ".ps1" or ".vbs" scripts leverage legitimately often. Apply additional filter and exclusions as necessary
name: Scripting/CommandLine Process Spawned Regsvr32
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\powershell_ise.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe") AND process.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe") AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:"C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \/s\ C\:\\Windows\\System32\\RpcProxy\\RpcProxy.dll")))
